name: mallabee/queue
description: Framework agnostic background task queue management for Beanstalkd, SQS, Redis. Easy to use in pure PHP, Symfony, Laravel, Yii2 projects. Based on illuminate/queue (Laravel Queues).

suggest.ext-pcntl: Required to use all features of the queue worker.
suggest.ext-posix: Required to use all features of the queue worker.
suggest.aws/aws-sdk-php: Required to use the SQS queue driver (^3.0).
suggest.predis/predis: Required to use the Redis queue driver (^1.0).
suggest.pda/pheanstalk: Required to use the Beanstalk queue driver (^4.0).
suggest.league/event: For handling worker events, catching exceptions, interacting with queues, etc (^2.1)..
suggest.jms/serializer: For encoding/decoding jobs from string to object (^1.13).
